document.full_text: the tampa bay rays blasted boston starter daisuke matsuzaka from the game after just two innings on the way to routing the red sox 16-5 on monday.
document.title: matsuzaka diced as rays rout red sox
lines_and_colors: the tampa bay rays blasted boston starter daisuke matsuzaka from the game after just two innings on the way to routing the red sox 16-5 on monday.
